chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Data: Type
nodes: seq nat
serialize: Data -> seq nat
deserialize: seq nat -> Data
ds_inverse: left_inverse serialize deserialize
stag: nat
prec: qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop
psafe: prec_safe
to: Equality.sort nat_eqType
this: Equality.sort nat_eqType

Goal:
Hn this to -> this \in nodes

Premises:
left_inverse = fun (A B : Type) (op : A -> B) (inv : B -> A) => forall x : A, inv (op x) = x : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> (B -> A) -> Prop Arguments left_inverse {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Hn = fun this to : nat_eqType => this \in nodes /\ to \in nodes : nat_eqType -> nat_eqType -> Prop
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
qstate = (reqs * resp)%type : Set
prec_safe = forall (this to : nat_eqType) (q : qstate) (m : seq nat), Hn this to -> prec q to m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := stag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} : Prop
nid = nat : Set
Notation seq := list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- Type] ?P : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- ?A -> Type]
perm_iotaP : forall x0 : ?T, let It := iota 0 (size ?t) in reflect (exists2 Is : seq nat_eqType, perm_eq Is It & ?s = [seq nth x0 ?t i | i <- Is]) (perm_eq ?s ?t) where ?T : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- eqType] ?s : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- seq ?T] ?t : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat ->...-> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- seq ?T]
Deprecation.hide : forall u : unit -> unit -> unit, Deprecation.exposed ?T u -> Deprecation.hidden ?T where ?T : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nat_eqType to : nat_eqType |- Type]
send_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => Hn this n /\ (exists C : coh d, prec (getSt this C) n msg) : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments send_safe _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Actions.tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Transitions.Exports.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> exists (s' : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s s' r
send_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d
mkseq : forall T : Type, (nat -> T) -> nat -> seq T
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
reshape_index = fun (sh : seq nat) (i : nat) => seq.find (pred1 0) (scanl subn i.+1 sh) : seq nat -> nat -> nat Arguments reshape_index _%seq_scope _%nat_scope
bigop.index_iota = fun m n : nat => iota m (n - m) : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments bigop.index_iota (_ _)%nat_scope
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
receive_step_fun = fun (q : qstate) (from : nid) (tag rid : nat) => let '(xs, ys) := q in if (tag == treq) && ((from, rid) \notin ys) then (xs, (from, rid) :: ys) else if (tag == tresp) && ((from, rid) \in xs) then (seq.rem (from, rid) xs, ys) else q : qstate -> nid -> nat -> nat -> reqs * seq (nid * nat) Arguments receive_step_fun _ _ (_ _)%nat_scope
iota = fix iota (m n : nat) {struct n} : seq nat := match n with | 0 => [::] | n'.+1 => m :: iota m.+1 n' end : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments iota (_ _)%nat_scope
trans_updDom : forall (this : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (s : heap), this \in nodes -> coh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes
send_step_fun = fun (q : qstate) (to : nid) (tag rid : nat) => let '(xs, ys) := q in if tag == treq then ((to, fresh_id xs) :: xs, ys) else if (tag == tresp) && ((to, rid) \in ys) then (xs, seq.rem (to, rid) ys) else q : qstate -> nid -> nat -> nat -> qstate Arguments send_step_fun _ _ (_ _)%nat_scope
seq.rem : forall T : eqType, T -> seq T -> seq T
getSt : nid -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> qstate
rotr = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T) => rot (size s - n) s : forall T : Type, nat -> seq T -> seq T Arguments rotr {T}%type_scope _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
rot = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T) => drop n s ++ take n s : forall T : Type, nat -> seq T -> seq T Arguments rot {T}%type_scope _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
remove_elem = fix remove_elem (xs : seq (nat * nat * seq nat)) (e : prod_eqType (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) (seq_eqType nat_eqType)) {struct xs} : seq (nat * nat * seq nat) := match xs with | [::] => [::] | x :: xs0 => if x == e then xs0 else x :: remove_elem xs0 e end : seq (nat * nat * seq nat) -> prod_eqType (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) (seq_eqType nat_eqType) -> seq (nat * nat * seq nat) Arguments remove_elem _%seq_scope
Msg : forall mtype : Type, mtype -> nat -> nat -> bool -> msg mtype
sorted : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> bool
fresh_id = fun xs : seq (nid * nat) => (last 0 (sort oleq (unzip2 xs))).+1 : seq (nid * nat) -> nat Arguments fresh_id _%seq_scope
addn = nosimpl addn_rec : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments addn (_ _)%nat_scope
subn = nosimpl subn_rec : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments subn (_ _)%nat_scope
scanl = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1) => fix scanl (x : T1) (s : seq T2) {struct s} : seq T1 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => let x' := g x y in x' :: scanl x' s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2 -> T1) -> T1 -> seq T2 -> seq T1 Arguments scanl {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%seq_scope
sorted_last_key_max : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> oleq x (last y s)
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
network_rely' = fun (w : world) (this : nid) => fix network_rely' (n : nat) (s1 s2 : state) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0 => s1 = s2 /\ s1 \In Coh w | n'.+1 => exists (z : nat_eqType) (s3 : state), [/\ this != z, network_step w z s1 s3 & network_rely' n' s3 s2] end : world -> nid -> nat -> state -> state -> Prop Arguments network_rely' _ _ _%nat_scope
fintype.bump = fun h i : nat => (h <= i) + i : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments fintype.bump (_ _)%nat_scope
fintype.unbump = fun h i : nat => i - (h < i) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments fintype.unbump (_ _)%nat_scope
seq.find = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix find (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0 | x :: s' => if a x then 0 else (find s').+1 end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> nat Arguments seq.find {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this

```  
intros Hn to_in_nodes. apply Hn in to_in_nodes. apply to_in_nodes.
